snippet: Rick Santorum maintained that a contested convention would fire up voters and, moreover, the shortest possible head-to-head matchup with Mr. Obama before the November vote would favor Republicans.
abstract: Rick Santorum maintained that a contested convention would fire up voters and, moreover, the shortest possible head-to-head matchup with Mr. Obama before the November vote would favor Republicans.

headline.main: Santorum Says Contested Convention Could Benefit G.O.P.
